price: እነዚያ እነርሱ በልቦቻቸው፣ በዓይኖቻቸውም፣ በጆሮዎቻቸውም ላይ አላህ ያተመባቸው ናቸው፡፡ እነዚያም ዝንጉዎቹ እነሱ ናቸው፡፤
arabic: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ طَبَعَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِمۡ وَسَمۡعِهِمۡ وَأَبۡصَٰرِهِمۡۖ وَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡغَٰفِلُونَ

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: ulāika alladhīna ṭabaʿa al-lahu ʿalā qulūbihim wasamʿihim wa-abṣārihim wa-ulāika humu al-ghāfilūna
